text:
@NorbertElekes 🇮🇹 Italy: 2-month-old baby believed to be Italy's youngest patient recovers

A two-month-old baby who was believed to have been Italy's youngest Covid-19 patient has been released from hospital after overcoming the disease, media reports said on Thursday (April 9).
